name: game-backlog-tracker
description: A web application for managing your video game backlog, tracking progress, and maintaining ratings/reviews.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint --prefix frontend" "npm run lint --prefix backend"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend" "npm run lint:fix --prefix backend"
scripts.format: concurrently "npm run format --prefix frontend" "npm run format --prefix backend"
